title: On the number of spurious memories in the Hopfield model
abstract: The outer-product method for programming the Hopfield model is discussed. The method can result in many spurious stable states-exponential in the number of vectors that are to be stored-even in the case when the vectors are orthogonal. >

tldr.text: The outer-product method for programming the Hopfield model is discussed, which can result in many spurious stable states-exponential in the number of vectors that are to be stored.
